item.title: GnuPG2使用指北
item.description: 测试环境为 mac gpg –version gpg (GnuPG) 2.2.11 libgcrypt 1.8.4 Copyright (C) 2018 Free Software Foundation, Inc. License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later https://gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html This

item.title: Mac下安装GNU工具集
item.description: 安装 Homebrew ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" 修改 .bashrc 或者 .zshrc 添加以下内容 export PATH="$(brew --prefix coreutils)/libexec/gnubin:/usr/local/bin:$PATH" 安装 GNU Core Command Line
